(This would include a severe allergic reaction [e.g., anaphylaxis] that required treatment with epinephrine or EpiPen® or that caused you to go to the hospital. It would also include an allergic reaction that caused hives, swelling, or respiratory distress, including wheezing.)
2. Have you ever had an allergic reaction to:
A component of a COVID-19 vaccine, including either of the following: \n• Polyethylene glycol (PEG), which is found in some medications, such as laxatives and preparations for colonoscopy procedure
• Polysorbate, which is found in some vaccines, film coated tablets, and intravenous steroids
• A previous dose of COVID-19 vaccine
1. What action that the person does not obey ?
a. Do you have any serious allergies, particularly anaphylaxis, to anything, or carry or have been prescribed an adrenaline autoinjector (EpiPen)?
b. Have you had an allergic reaction after being vaccinated before?
c. Have you had COVID-19 before?
d. Do you have a bleeding disorder?
e. Do you take any medicine to thin your blood (an anticoagulant therapy)?
f. Do you have a weakened immune system (immunocompromised)?
g. Are you pregnant (having a baby) or think you might be pregnant?
h. Are you planning to get pregnant?
j. Have you been sick with a cough, sore throat, fever or are feeling sick in another way?
k. Have you had a COVID-19 vaccination before?
l. Have received any other vaccination in the last 14 days?
